meta_description: The Museum of California Art, located in Laguna Beach, offers a variety of exhibitions, docent-guided tours, and programs for all ages.
hours_text:
Tickets 

#### 

#### General

### $15.00  

#### 

#### Students 20+, Seniors and Military

### $10.00

#### 

#### Youth 19 and under

### Free

Free for museum members. Free on the first Thursday of each month from 6:00 to 9:00 p.m. Thank you to The Segerstrom Foundation for providing free admission for children 12 years of age and younger. Special thanks to the Yes to Youth Contributors for providing free admission for children and teens 19 years of age and younger.

Free for members of the military and their families from Armed Forces Day through Labor Day.

### Accessibility

Restrooms include accessible facilities. The museum is wheelchair accessible, with an elevator between each floor. The museum does not have parking, but there are parking spaces accessible for persons with disabilities at the meters nearby on Cliff Drive. If you have a Disabled Person Placard, you may park in an on-street metered parking space without having to pay (for up to 72 hours). However, you must pay to park in a regular, non-accessible space in the city parking lots.

[Pre-Visit Guide](/assets/2986/lam-pre-visit-guide-2024091205262797.pdf)

Admissions, Location, Hours 

### Tuesday-Sunday: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm

### Monday: Closed

Open select Mondays and Holidays, such as (when falling on Monday): Martin Luther King Jr. Day, President’s Day, Memorial Day, Juneteenth, Labor Day and Indigenous Peoples Day.

Selected time

##  10:00 AM –  4:00 PM

**Please select the date and time you would like to visit using the links above. **

**LAM members:** Please sign in or register, using the blue button in the upper right-hand corner, in order to receive your membership benefits online.

For NARM, Groupon, Museums on Us, or other discounts, please call 949.494.8971 x200 to reserve tickets. Present your name and discount materials when you arrive for your visit.

Laguna Art Museum is closed on New Year’s Day, Fourth of July, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day.
